sentences.en: During the turmoil in the foreign-exchange markets the guilder remained strong.
sentences.cn: 荷兰盾在外汇交易市场的动荡中保持坚挺。

sentences.en: His mind was in a turmoil.
His mind was in such a turmoil that he couldn't get to sleep.
sentences.cn: 内心的纷扰使他无法入睡.

sentences.en: My emotional turmoil had drained me.
sentences.cn: 纷乱的情绪让我心力交瘁。

sentences.en: My mind is in a turmoil.
She lived through the turmoil of the French Revolution.
sentences.cn: 她经历过法国大革命的混乱之后仍旧活着。

sentences.en: Thanks to Kao Sung - nien's skill , the turmoil had been quelled.
sentences.cn: 亏高松年有本领, 弹压下去.

sentences.en: The house, the neighbours, the whole town were in a turmoil.
sentences.cn: 家庭 、 邻居 、 整个镇子都骚动了.

sentences.en: The mental turmoil, showed quickly in his work.
sentences.cn: 胡思乱想很快就影响了他的工作.

sentences.en: The robbery put the village in a turmoil.
The town was in a turmoil during the election.
sentences.cn: 该城镇在选举期间陷入混乱.

sentences.en: Throughout the conflict and turmoil he remained remarkably the same man.
sentences.cn: 经过一切冲突和动乱,他却异乎寻常地“依然故我”.

sentences.en: When the seas are in turmoil , heroes are on their mettle.
sentences.cn: 沧海横流,方显出英雄本色.

sentences.en: Your mind is in such a turmoil you do not know what you are saying.
sentences.cn: 你心烦意乱，根本不知道自己在说什么。
